enterprise.title: Why DekuSMS Enterprise?

feature1.title: Fast Delivery

feature2.title: Secure Transmission
feature2.desc: Your data is encrypted and secure.

featureHighlight.title: Powerful Messaging
featureHighlight.desc: Powerful messaging solutions tailored for businesses. Seamless Messaging with DekuSMS. Fast, secure, and reliable messaging for your business.

pricing.aboutLine1: is a next-generation SMS solution designed for privacy, security, and seamless integration.
pricing.aboutLine2: Whether you need encrypted messaging, real-time cloud synchronization, or customizable settings, DekuSMS is built to empower you. Say goodbye to outdated SMS limitations and hello to the future of messaging.
pricing.pricingSubTitle: Choose the perfect plan for your messaging needs

features.analyticsDesc: Gain real-time insights into your message traffic.

featureList.title: Secure Delivery
